label: Organization & Formatting
description: Most formatting guidelines are followed; only one or two components from the template are missing.

label: Organization & Formatting
description: Most formatting guidelines are followed; several components from the template are missing or incomplete.

label: Survey Content
description: Rmd files are complete and compile without error to html pages. All referenced files are on the web (not local).

label: Survey Content
description: Rmd files are complete and compile to html pages mostly without error (may need one or two small fixeds). All referenced files are on the web (not local).

label: Survey Content
description: Rmd files are incomplete and / or missing, and they require multiple fixes to compile into html files. References local files that are not yet on the web.

label: Conjoint Questions
description: Randomized conjoint questions render on live formr survey without error.

label: Conjoint Questions
description: Randomized conjoint questions render on live formr survey with only one or two errors (e.g. image load fail).

label: Conjoint Questions
description: Randomized conjoint questions have major issues rendering on the live formr survey. Page load fails or content is displayed in an unintelligle manner.

label: formr
description: Entire survey renders on live survey without errors, user can get to end and questions are clear and understandable.

label: formr
description: The survey contains one or two errors when rendering in formr, but the user can still get to the end of the survey.

label: formr
description: An error page displays preventing continuation in the survey, or multiple major errors exist in the survey making it difficult to understand the questions.
